text: Agu dama nei, maanadu ina di hai a king Balak o Moab dela ne hagamaanadu bolo e hai adu gi goodou, mo di hai a Balaam go tama daane a Beor, dela ne helekai gi mee. Maanadu ina labelaa nia mee ala ne kila i di godou taele mai i Acacia gi Gilgal. Haga maanadu ina malaa nia mee aanei, gei goodou ga langahia agu mee ala ne hai belee benebene goodou.”6.5 Numbers 22.2—24.25; Joshua 3.1—4.19
